t: Amazon Looks to ‘Modernize Automotive Retail’ by Selling Cars with Hyundai - Retail TouchPoints
s: December 11, 2024 - While Amazon Autos has initially launched with new Hyundai vehicles only, the service will expand to include additional automotive brands next year, as well as additional cities and features,such as leasing and expanded financing options.
